      • addition

        public static BayesianAbstractFactor addition​(BayesianAbstractFactor one,
                                              BayesianAbstractFactor two)

        This generic implementation checks if the current factor is in log space and also the given one. If both are false, then a SimpleBayesianOperation algebra will be used and a BayesianDefaultFactor will be produced; otherwise a LogBayesianOperation algebra will be used, the second factor will be converted to a BayesianLogFactor (if needed) and a BayesianLogFactor will be returned.

        The BayesianOperation.add(BayesianFactor, int, BayesianFactor, int) method will be used.

        Parameters:
        one - the factor on the left
        two - the factor on the right to combine with
        Returns:
        a BayesianLogFactor if this factor works in log-space, otherwise a BayesianDefaultFactor
